front.title: Aggregation Trace Option for In-situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM)

abstract.t: The purpose of this memo is to describe a new option type for In-Situ Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (IOAM). This option type allows to aggregate IOAM data along a network path. Aggregates include functions such as the sum, average, minimum, or maximum of a given data parameter.
